terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our website
terms.agreement: By using our website, you agree to these terms and conditions

seo.title: Terms & Conditions
seo.description: Read the terms and conditions for using Aromatic Scents Lab website

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By using the Aromatic Scents Lab website, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to any part of these terms, please do not use our website or services.

sections.title: Use of Website
sections.content: You are permitted to use this website for personal and non-commercial purposes only. You may not use the website for any unlawful or prohibited purpose under these terms. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or sell any content from this website without prior written permission.

sections.title: User Accounts
sections.content: When creating an account, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and password. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

sections.title: Products and Pricing
sections.content: We strive to display accurate information about our products and prices. However, errors may occur. We reserve the right to correct any errors and change prices without prior notice. All prices are displayed in Saudi Riyals unless otherwise stated.

sections.title: Orders and Payment
sections.content: By placing an order, you are making an offer to purchase products. We reserve the right to accept or reject any order for any reason. Payment must be made in full before the order is shipped. We accept the payment methods specified on our website.

sections.title: Shipping and Delivery
sections.content: Delivery times stated are estimates and are not guaranteed. We are not responsible for delays caused by circumstances beyond our control. Please review our shipping policy for detailed information.

sections.title: Returns and Exchanges
sections.content: We accept returns in accordance with our return policy. Products must be in their original condition and unopened to qualify for return. Please review our return policy for full details.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content on this website, including text, images, logos, and trademarks, is the property of Aromatic Scents Lab or its licensors. Use of any content without prior written permission is prohibited.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: We shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our website or products. Our maximum liability is limited to the amount you paid for the product in question.

sections.title: Governing Law
sections.content: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Saudi Arabia.

sections.title: Modifications
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Changes will become effective immediately upon posting on the website. Your continued use of the website after any changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about these terms and conditions, please contact us at: legal@aromaticscentslab.com

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data
privacy.contactCta: If you have any questions or concerns, don't hesitate to contact us

seo.title: Privacy Policy
seo.description: Learn how Aromatic Scents Lab protects your privacy and personal data

sections.title: Information Collection
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us when you create an account, make a purchase, subscribe to our newsletter, or contact us. This information includes: name, email address, phone number, shipping and billing address, and payment information.

sections.title: Use of Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to process and manage your orders, communicate with you about your orders and our products and services, improve our website and services, send marketing communications (if you have opted in), and comply with legal obligations.

sections.title: Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with service providers who help us operate our business (such as shipping companies and payment processors), only to the extent necessary to provide their services.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We take reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. We use SSL encryption to protect data transmitted through our website.

sections.title: Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience on our website, remember your preferences, and analyze how our website is used. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, correct, and delete your personal information. You can also unsubscribe from marketing communications at any time. To exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

sections.title: Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our website and updating the 'Last Updated' date.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at: privacy@aromaticscentslab.com

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about our products and services
faq.notFoundText: Contact us and we'll be happy to help

seo.title: Frequently Asked Questions
seo.description: Answers to the most common questions about our products and services

items.question: What is your shipping policy?
items.answer: We offer free shipping on orders over 200 SAR within Saudi Arabia. Orders are delivered within 2-5 business days. For international shipping, please contact us for pricing details and delivery times.

items.question: Can I return a product?
items.answer: Yes, we accept returns within 14 days of receipt, provided the product is unopened and in its original condition. Please contact customer service to initiate a return.

items.question: How can I track my order?
items.answer: After your order is shipped, you will receive an email with a tracking number and a link to track your shipment. You can also track your order through your account on our website.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), Mada, Apple Pay, and cash on delivery for orders within Saudi Arabia.

items.question: Are your products authentic?
items.answer: Yes, all our products are 100% authentic and made from the finest natural ingredients. We guarantee the quality and authenticity of every product we offer.

items.question: How do I choose the right fragrance for me?
items.answer: We recommend testing the fragrance on your skin before purchasing. You can request samples of our fragrances or visit one of our stores to try them. You can also contact our team for personalized recommendations based on your preferences.

items.question: Do you offer gift wrapping?
items.answer: Yes, we offer complimentary luxury gift wrapping. You can select this service at checkout and add a personal message if desired.

items.question: How do I preserve my fragrance longer?
items.answer: To maintain fragrance quality, store it in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Close the cap tightly after each use and avoid exposing the fragrance to high temperatures.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help. Reach out to us for any inquiries or feedback.

seo.title: Shipping Information
seo.description: Learn about Aromatic Scents Lab's shipping and delivery policy

sections.title: Shipping Locations
sections.content: We ship to all major cities within Saudi Arabia and select international destinations. Domestic orders are typically delivered within 2-5 business days, while international shipping times vary by location.

sections.title: Order Processing Time
sections.content: Orders are processed within 1-2 business days. You will receive a confirmation email with tracking information once your order has been shipped.

sections.title: Shipping Rates
sections.content: We offer free shipping on orders over 200 SAR within Saudi Arabia. For orders below this amount, a flat shipping fee applies. International shipping rates are calculated at checkout based on destination and package weight.

sections.title: Order Tracking
sections.content: Once your order is shipped, you will receive an email with a tracking number. You can use this number to track your package on our website or the carrier's website.

seo.title: About Us - Aromatic Scents Lab
seo.description: Discover our journey in crafting premium fragrances - we take you on a journey through ingredients to experience and explore the bare essential component of the Scent

cta.title: Begin Your Fragrance Journey
cta.subtitle: Discover our exclusive collection of handcrafted fragrances

sections.title: Our Story
sections.content: Aromatic Scents Lab was born from a passion for the art of perfumery. We believe that fragrance is more than just a scent â€“ it's an experience that evokes emotions, memories, and connections. Our journey began with a simple mission: to create exceptional fragrances that tell a story and leave a lasting impression.

sections.title: Our Journey
sections.content: From our humble beginnings to becoming a recognized name in the fragrance industry, our journey has been one of continuous learning and innovation. We travel the world to source the finest ingredients, from the lavender fields of Provence to the oud forests of Southeast Asia. Each ingredient is carefully selected to ensure the highest quality in every bottle.

sections.title: Our Collection
sections.content: Our collection features a diverse range of fragrances, from timeless classics to modern interpretations. Whether you prefer the warmth of oriental notes, the freshness of citrus, or the elegance of floral bouquets, we have something for every taste. Each fragrance is crafted with precision and care, using traditional techniques combined with modern innovation.

sections.title: Our Promise
sections.content: We are committed to excellence in everything we do. From the quality of our ingredients to the craftsmanship of our bottles, every detail matters. We promise to deliver fragrances that not only smell exceptional but also reflect our dedication to sustainability and ethical sourcing. Your satisfaction is our ultimate goal.
